answers.answer: True Lols my first 2 pregnancies went smoothly But this 1 oh gosh cant wait until its out. Its givin me hard time

Right! My first two fine except went over due dates... this third one 29+6 and I have high blood pressure and baby is struggling with iugr and I was told last week top be ready to be sent to l&d at a moments notice. Craziness!
SAME THING HAPPENED TO ME.... except right before my 3 hour glucose they take your fasting levels and mine were too high to even take the test twice so they diagnosed me with Gestational Diabetes.

This is my 3rd as well and the other 2 were good pregnancies minus the high blood pressure and this 3rd pregnancy has kicked my butt! Totally the last one for us I don't think my body could handle another one. How did the woman Michelle Duggar from 19 kids and counting have 17 pregnancies??????? I would DIE!!!

It must be the 3rd pregnancy! My first 2 were a breeze. This one has been up and down the whole time. My little guy has a 2 cord vessel instead of a 3 cord vessel.I'm 25 weeks on bedrest having contractions.... Praying that I make it full term. Hang in there ladies we will be to the end soon:)
Yeah without a second thought this is our last I could never do it again
Same here, hands down this is our last as well!

question: Well this is my third pregnancy I will be 30 weeks tomorrow and have had a ruff go of it (all three have been hard pregnancies) with my firsts two I had high blood pressure and had to be induced early. But this one so far anyway my blood pressure is being nice but just found out I failed my glucose test and have to have to do another one on Friday. Not to worried yet because I know lots of people fail the first and pass the second. Just funny you never know what will happen with each pregnancy
title: third babyis mixing things up a bit
